mapper.select: select count(*) from usertable where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into usertable ( user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_address_post, user_address, user_address_detail ) values ( #{userId}, #{userPasswd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, #{userAddressPost}, #{userAddress}, #{userAddressDetail} )
mapper.update: update usertable set user_name = #{userName}, user_passwd = #{newPassword}, user_email =#{userEmail}, user_tel = #{userTel}, user_address_post = #{userAddressPost}, user_address = #{userAddress}, user_address_detail = #{userAddressDetail} where user_id = #{userId} and user_passwd =#{oldPassword}
